page.title: 18GT GADDESDEN SCHOOL
page.content: This mixed school consists of the Junior Children's Class of 20 from 7 to 11 years and the Infants' Class of l4 from 5 to 7 years. EDUCATION There are 3 TEACHERS:Mrs Boatman for Infants, full-time teaching Head Mrs Hollingsworth, and Mrs Liveridge only on Wednesday mornings for the Juniors. In LESSONS, individual studies are reading, composition and mathematics. Joint class work in English, handwriting, P.E., music, literature, art and craft, and environmental studies is expanded individually. Interesting places are visited for the school PROJECTS undertaken by the infants and for the 2 short and one major project which the Juniors investigate.
